emergency_loan.title: üí∏ Emergency Loan Program
content: Provides immediate funding support for temporary financial shortfalls due to delays in funding, unexpected expenses, or temporary inability to cover essential living expenses.
Loans are not issued to pay for any university tuition or fees.
Eligibility: Must be a current undergraduate or graduate student with satisfactory academic standing and demonstrate the ability to repay the loan within six months.
Application: Submit online through the Emergency Loan application portal.
Disbursement: Approved funds are sent via Interac e-transfer by the end of the next business day.
Repayment: Payments can be made online through various banks; failure to repay may result in a financial hold on your student account.
Contact: bursaries@ualberta.ca
More Info: https://www.ualberta.ca/registrar/scholarships-awards-financial-support/bursaries-emergency-funding/emergency-loan.html

domestic_supplementary_bursary.title: üá®üá¶ Domestic Supplementary Bursary
content: Available to domestic undergraduate and graduate students demonstrating financial need for the current academic year.
Applicants must have exhausted all available funding resources and meet academic and enrollment requirements.
Application Period: October to June of each academic year.
Application: Completed online through the Application for Financial Support system.
Disbursement: Bursary offers are applied to outstanding tuition or fees; remaining funds are refunded via e-Transfer through PayMyTuition.
Acceptance: Offers must be accepted in Bear Tracks before the specified deadline.
Contact: bursaries@ualberta.ca
More Info: https://www.ualberta.ca/registrar/scholarships-awards-financial-support/bursaries-emergency-funding/domestic-supplementary-bursary.html

international_supplementary_bursary.title: üåê International Supplementary Bursary
content: Provides financial assistance to international undergraduate and graduate students who demonstrate a financial shortfall for academic and basic living costs in the current academic year.
Eligibility: Must be an international student in the second year or higher, currently enrolled at the University of Alberta, and in satisfactory academic standing.
Application Period: October to June of each academic year. Specific deadlines are December 15 for Fall term only, April 15 for Winter term, and June 15 for Spring/Summer term.
Application: Submit online through the Application for Financial Support system. Ensure all required documentation is provided to avoid delays.
Required Documentation: Financial statements for August and September, proof of funding received or expected, explanation of financial situation, and any deviations from the original financial plan.
Assessment Criteria: Applications are evaluated based on completeness of documentation, demonstration of financial need, and adherence to a moderate standard of living.
Disbursement: Approved bursary funds are first applied to any outstanding tuition or fees, then any remaining funds are refunded via e-Transfer through PayMyTuition.
Reassessment: Requests must be submitted within 15 days after the final class of the term, accompanied by new financial information or documentation of extenuating circumstances.
Contact: bursaries@ualberta.ca
More Info: https://www.ualberta.ca/registrar/scholarships-awards-financial-support/bursaries-emergency-funding/international-supplementary-bursary.html

gsa_emergency_bursary.title: üéì GSA Emergency Bursary
content: Available to graduate students who are current GSA members facing unanticipated emergencies.
Applicants must have exhausted all other available funding options before applying.
Maximum award amount is $4,000 CAD.
Applications are open year-round through the Application for Financial Support system, subject to available funding.
Approved funds are sent via Interac e-transfer within 1 to 2 business days after approval.
Contact: bursaries@ualberta.ca
More Info: https://www.ualberta.ca/registrar/scholarships-awards-financial-support/bursaries-emergency-funding/gsa-emergency-bursary.html
